title: Electoral Process (Local Government By Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2024
content:
5th January, 2024 Statutory Instruments 23
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 2 of 2024
The Electoral Process Act 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 201 6, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order,
2024.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor nomination for in Date and
the wards set out in the schedule shall lodge a nomination election Time of
nomination
with the returning officer on Thursday, 1st February, 2024 between
for election
09:00 hours and 15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 2nd Campaign
February, 2024 at 14:00 hours and close at 18:00 hours on Thursday, Period
29th February, 2024.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Councilor in the wards set Election
out in the schedule shall take place on Friday, 1st March, 2024 date and
between 06:00 hours and 18:00 hours. time of poll
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
